title: Baron the throw zone strikes agian!

embed.description: Just sharing some of my plays as a climb the ranked ladder Thanks for watching! Make sure to like and subscribe -------------- Graves Baron Steal

body:
My first video, hope you guys like it.

i want to share some of the highlights as a climb the ladder, hope you enjoy this short clip..

Peace


**EDIT: Newer improved version of my video in comments below**

replies.body: Tf used his ult when i pinged the pit. we were able to watch the HP of baron.

Yeah for vid's like this, either do all vision after a no vision showing, or just show your own vision.

Also the most surprising part for me is how it's max range of the ult splash that you hit it with.

Hey man, thanks for the feedback.

in that video i had all vision active, i guess the reasoning behind it was because of the TF ult giving me vision of barons HP 

I'll be taking your advise on board tho in these situations and just have it switched to mine, that way it shows what i saw.


yea the AOE cone effect of graves ult is quite long 200yrds , im pretty sure it was literally at 100% range.


EDIT:

New version, Thoughts?

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=0n3oItC1QJc

Better.

And yeah that's kinda bullshit.

Just generally you look at the vision so that it's a matter of an idea of the harder vision.

Your awesome mate, thanks for the feedback

yea his ult can be bullshit sometimes, very good at catching people and objectives

800yrds for the bullet + 200yrds for the cone.

I really like it better this way!
Good job on improving based a feedback.

Also epic steal either way :D.

Thanks mate, 

yea i want to improve both on video content and rank!

hoping to make some regular content and share :)
